mapper.insert: insert into teamdevelopment (develovpment_sid, development_picture, development_timesstamp, development_content, development_note) values (#{develovpmentSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{developmentPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{developmentTimesstamp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{developmentContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{developmentNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select develovpment_sid, development_picture, development_timesstamp, development_content, development_note from teamdevelopment where develovpment_sid = #{develovpmentSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select develovpment_sid, development_picture, development_timesstamp, development_content, development_note from teamdevelopment
select develovpment_sid, development_picture, development_timesstamp, development_content, development_note from teamdevelopment ORDER BY develovpment_sid DESC LIMIT 1
select develovpment_sid, development_picture, development_timesstamp, development_content, development_note from teamdevelopment ORDER BY develovpment_sid DESC LIMIT 1
